content.name: p
children: In the realm of CTF, where challenges take flight, Buffer overflows emerge, revealing their might. Craft your payload with care, injecting shellcode's grace, Invoke syscalls with rax as 0x3b, unlocking the desired space.

content.name: p
children: In this code-laden land, where exploits come to play, Shellcode dances, leading the triumphant way. With assembly's artistry, the shell shall be obtained, And the cherished flag claimed, as victory is sustained.
